lexUnit.name: trudge.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: walk slowly and with heavy steps, typically because of exhaustion or harsh conditions.

sentence.text: She gave a dark scowl , left the room and trudged downstairs , her mood so prickly that she knew it would only need one wrong word from Julius to trigger off her own temper .
